title: Need help understanding preseason
body: Alright so lately Ive played a lot in ranked since the start of preseason and I've climbed to plat 5 from gold 4 and i have encountered so many people trolling saying that its pointless trying in ranked because it's preseason and it won't affect your rank next season. Now i know preseason mmr doesn't affect ranked next season but does your overall rank? Like if i climb to let's say plat 3 or so and the season ends will i be put in like plat 4 or 5 after reset? Or will i be put back to like gold 4? So should i be trying to climb higher or not bother? Need some help sorry if it's hard to understand my English isn't too good. Thanks

replies.body:
I'm an ARAM only player, so I can't help you.

But I'm just posting to say your English is fine, better than most on these forums in fact.
